messages.subject: OT: Any Unschoolers in Redding/Anderson?
messages.msgSnippet: We are very strongly looking into moving to Redding or nearby in Northern California, since our home search in the environs of Los Angeles is pretty much a
messages.messageBody:
We are very strongly looking into moving to Redding or nearby in Northern
California, since our home search in the environs of Los Angeles is pretty
much a bust, and Redding is beautiful.

I know there are some Home schoolers there, but are there Unschoolers from
this list there?

Robyn L. Coburn
